title: Task 68

question.text: Which of these sentences uses they are correctly?

answers.feedback: All the options show instances where they is used to represent multiple people or things in the present.

answers.answer: I think they are going to the party later.
answers.feedback: All the options show instances where they is used to represent multiple people or things in the present.

answers.answer: My favorite colors? They are blue and green.
answers.feedback: All the options show instances where they is used to represent multiple people or things in the present.

description: In English, the pronoun they is used for multiple people or things. When talking about the present, they is often paired with are.
